block.p: Valerie Ann Latona, a daughter of Valeria and Salvatore Latona of Buffalo, was married yesterday to David Marc Contract, a son of Rosalee and Lloyd Contract of Stamford, Conn. The Rev. Melvin Grant, a Baptist minister, performed an interfaith ceremony at the Ocean Club on Paradise Island in the Bahamas.

Ms. Latona, 30, is keeping her name. She is a senior editor at Allure magazine in New York. She graduated magna cum laude from Canisius College and received a master's degree in journalism from New York University. Her father is a lawyer in Buffalo.

Valerie Ann Latona, a daughter of Valeria and Salvatore Latona of Buffalo, was married yesterday to David Marc Contract, a son of Rosalee and Lloyd Contract of Stamford, Conn. The Rev. Melvin Grant, a Baptist minister, performed an interfaith ceremony at the Ocean Club on Paradise Island in the Bahamas.

Ms. Latona, 30, is keeping her name. She is a senior editor at Allure magazine in New York. She graduated magna cum laude from Canisius College and received a master's degree in journalism from New York University. Her father is a lawyer in Buffalo.

Mr. Contract, 29, is the director of marketing for KaplanCollege.com, a Web site offering professional and college-level courses, in New York. He graduated from Princeton University and received a master's degree cum laude in management from Northwestern University. He is a founder and an owner of Campus Directories Inc., in Montvale, N.J., which publishes orientation guides for college students. His father retired as a chemical engineer in Stamford for Kvaerner John Brown, an engineering and construction company.
